name: teebay
description: Welcome to **Teebay**, your one-stop online marketplace for all your buying, selling, and renting needs. Teebay is built using a modern tech stack, including ***React, Vite, Tailwind CSS, Apollo Client, Redux*** in the frontend, and ***Express.js, GraphQL, Apollo Server, Prisma, and PostgreSQL*** in the backend. It also utilizes ***JWT*** for user authentication.
author: Kakon Karmoker
